languages.text: Благодаря данным, собранным слугой почтенного губернатора Вьятт и проанализированным сам{mf|им|ой} Лорд-капитаном, планы атак мятежников были вскрыты и могли быть упреждены.

traits.locale_text: Благодаря данным, собранным слугой почтенного губернатора Вьятт и проанализированным сам{mf|им|ой} Лордом-капитаном, планы атак мятежников были вскрыты и могли быть упреждены.

languages.text: Thanks to data gathered by a retainer of the esteemed Governor Vyatt and analysed by the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the rebels' attack plans were exposed, creating the opportunity to devise a counterstrategy.
languages.original_text: Благодаря данным, собранным слугой почтенного губернатора Вьятт и проанализированным сам{mf|им|ой} Лорд-капитаном, планы атак мятежников были вскрыты и могли быть упреждены.

traits.locale_text: Thanks to data gathered by a retainer of the esteemed Governor Vyatt and analyzed by the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the rebels' attack plans were exposed, creating the opportunity to devise a counterstrategy.

Thanks to data gathered by a retainer of the esteemed Governor Vyatt and analyzed by the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the rebels' attack plans were exposed, creating the opportunity to devise a counterstrategy.

Thanks to data gathered by a retainer of the esteemed Governor Vyatt and analyzed by the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the rebels' attack plans were exposed, creating the opportunity to devise a counterstrategy.

Thanks to data gathered by a retainer of the esteemed Governor Vyatt and analysed by the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the rebels' attack plans were exposed, creating the opportunity to devise a counterstrategy.

languages.text: 尊敬捧げられしビャット総督の従者が集めたデータに加え、ロード・キャプテン自らの分析のおかげで反乱軍の攻撃計画が明らかになり、対抗戦略を立案する好機を得た。
languages.original_text: Thanks to data gathered by a retainer of the esteemed Governor Vyatt and analysed by the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the rebels' attack plans were exposed, creating the opportunity to devise a counterstrategy.

traits.locale_text: 尊敬捧げられしビャット総督の従者が集めたデータに加え、ロード・キャプテン自らの分析のおかげで反乱軍の攻撃計画が明らかになり、対抗戦略を立案する好機を得た。

languages.text: 尊贵的维亚特总督手下的家臣收集到了足够的情报，再加之舰长大人本人的出色分析，政府军看穿了叛军的攻击计划，为制定反击策略创造了机会。
languages.original_text: Thanks to data gathered by a retainer of the esteemed Governor Vyatt and analysed by the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the rebels' attack plans were exposed, creating the opportunity to devise a counterstrategy.

traits.locale_text: 尊贵的维亚特总督手下的家臣收集到了足够的情报，再加之舰长大人本人的出色分析，政府军看穿了叛军的攻击计划，为制定反击策略创造了机会。

languages.text: Gracias a los datos recopilados por el personal de la estimada gobernadora Vyatt y analizados por {mf|el propio Lord Capitán|la propia Lord Capitán}, los planes de ataque de los rebeldes quedaron expuestos y pudo idearse una estrategia para contrarrestarlos.
languages.original_text: Thanks to data gathered by a retainer of the esteemed Governor Vyatt and analysed by the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the rebels' attack plans were exposed, creating the opportunity to devise a counterstrategy.

traits.locale_text: Gracias a los datos recopilados por el personal de la estimada gobernadora Vyatt y analizados por {mf|el propio Lord Capitán|la propia Lord Capitán}, los planes de ataque de los rebeldes quedaron expuestos y pudo idearse una estrategia para contrarrestarlos.

languages.text: Aufgrund von Daten, die von einem Faktotum der geschätzten Gouverneurin Vyatt beschafft und vom Lord Captain selbst analysiert wurden, konnten die Angriffspläne der Rebellen aufgedeckt werden, was eine Gegenstrategie ermöglichte.
languages.original_text: Thanks to data gathered by a retainer of the esteemed Governor Vyatt and analysed by the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the rebels' attack plans were exposed, creating the opportunity to devise a counterstrategy.

traits.locale_text: Aufgrund von Daten, die von einem Faktotum der geschätzten Gouverneurin Vyatt beschafft und vom Lord Captain selbst analysiert wurden, konnten die Angriffspläne der Rebellen aufgedeckt werden, was eine Gegenstrategie ermöglichte.

languages.text: Grâce aux données réunies par un domestique de l'honorable gouverneure Vyatt et analysées par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} en personne, les plans d'attaque des rebelles purent être exposés, offrant ainsi l'opportunité de mettre au point une contre-stratégie.
languages.original_text: Thanks to data gathered by a retainer of the esteemed Governor Vyatt and analysed by the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the rebels' attack plans were exposed, creating the opportunity to devise a counterstrategy.

traits.locale_text: Grâce aux données réunies par un domestique de l'honorable gouverneure Vyatt et analysées par {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} en personne, les plans d'attaque des rebelles purent être exposés, offrant ainsi l'opportunité de mettre au point une contre-stratégie.

languages.text: Muhterem Vali Vyatt'ın hizmetlisinin topladığı ve bizzat Lord Kaptan'ın analiz ettiği veriler sayesinde isyancıların saldırı planları ortaya çıkarıldı. Bu vesileyle karşı bir strateji geliştirme imkânı elde edildi.
languages.original_text: Thanks to data gathered by a retainer of the esteemed Governor Vyatt and analysed by the Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself}, the rebels' attack plans were exposed, creating the opportunity to devise a counterstrategy.

traits.locale_text: Muhterem Vali Vyatt'ın hizmetlisinin topladığı ve bizzat Lord Kaptan'ın analiz ettiği veriler sayesinde isyancıların saldırı planları ortaya çıkarıldı. Bu vesileyle karşı bir strateji geliştirme imkânı elde edildi.
